mapper.select: select infoImg infoImg from flow_info_img where infoId=#{id}

select count(1) as aa from flow_info_read where infoId=#{infoId}
and staffCode=#{staffCode}

SELECT COUNT(*) as unreadCount,typeName from flow_info fi INNER JOIN flow_info_accept fia ON fi.id=fia.infoId LEFT JOIN flow_info_read fir on fir.infoId=fi.id and fir.staffCode=#{user.staffCode} where infoAcceptName in (#{user.staffCode},#{user.department} ,#{user.BU},'公司') and fir.status IS null GROUP BY typeName
select role from authority where staffCode=#{staffCode}
mapper.update: update flow_info_read set integralStatus=1 where staffCode=#{staffCode} and infoId=#{infoId}
mapper.select: select flw.id,flw.info_id,flw.leave_word,date_format(flw.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time,flw.staff_code,u.`头像` as comment,dp.`姓名` as username from flow_leave_word flw INNER JOIN datacenter_personnel dp on flw.staff_code=dp.`人员编码` INNER JOIN usertable u on u.`员工编码`=flw.staff_code where flw.info_id=#{infoId}

select flwc.id,flwc.info_leave_word_id,flwc.staff_code,flwc.receive_staff_code,flwc.leave_word,flwc.create_time, (select 姓名 from datacenter_personnel where 人员编码=flwc.receive_staff_code) as comment, (select 姓名 from datacenter_personnel where 人员编码=flwc.staff_code) as username from flow_leave_word_child flwc where info_leave_word_id=#{id}
